name: reductionism
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
formal the practice of considering or presenting something complicated in a simple way, especially a way that is too simple: Reductionism as a way of understanding food or drugs can lead to problems. Reductionism only works until you get to the tricky bits. Synonym
reductivism
science
  specialized the belief that complex living systems can be explained by the laws of physics and chemistry: It is interesting to see him exposing the fallacy of scientific reductionism - the idea that everything must be explained in terms of experimental science .
